96.eng-name: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`id bin Al-Musaiyab:Abu Huraira said that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "I have been sent with 'Jawami-al-Kalim ' (the shortest expression with the widest meaning) and have been made victorious with awe (cast in my enemy's hearts), and while I was sleeping, I saw that the keys of the treasures of the world were placed in my hand." Abu Huraira added: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) has gone, and you people are utilizing those treasures, or digging those treasures out." or said a similar sentence

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " بُعِثْتُ بِجَوَامِعِ الْكَلِمِ ".
chapter.eng-name: “I have been sent with Jawami Kalim’
